articles.author: Shankhyaneel Sarkar
articles.title: Air India Flights Avoid Iranian Airspace As Tensions Spiral In West Asia - News18
articles.description: Air India, Qantas, Lufthansa and Austrian Airlines are avoiding the Iranian airspace.
articles.content: Air India flights are avoiding Iranian airspace as a precautionary measure as tensions rise in West Asia following Iranian threat of reprisals for the alleged Israeli strike on Irans embassy in Syria… [+2043 chars]
